gasPriceExceeded: Gas price must be greater than {}
derivedAddresses: A wallet can have multiple public addresses derived from the main address.
readOnlyDescription: You can add this wallet as a read only wallet to other wallet applications with your extended public key.No secret will be shared.
displayMnemonicDescription: You can display your mnemonic (seed phrase , paper key) in can you have lost your backup, or to confirm that your backup is correct.
deleteWalletDescription: Please make sure you saved your mnemonic before deleting this wallet , are you sure you want to continue?
mnemonicSafe: Please keep this mnemonic safe and secure.
advancedOperationsDescription: Advanced operations reserved to more experienced users. A "normal" user should not need to use them very often, if not at all.
minersOrDeFiUse: Useful for miners or DeFi use.
generateAddressDescription: Default address for sending transactions. Note that if activated, {}... will not be the main address anymore.
title: Title
verifyMnemonicDescription: Please put the correspondent word to the index.
newWalletDescription: Create a wallet (keys and an address) from a randomly generated mnemonic.
restoreWalletDescription: Restores a wallet's keys and address from a mnemonic phrase.
enterMnemonic: Enter your mnemonic to restore your wallet :
readOnlyWalletDescription: Add a wallet address in read-only mode. This won't save any secrets in this device.
enterAddressOrPublicKey: Enter your public wallet addresses or your extended public key to add wallet in read only mode
socialLink: This project is open source , find help on
activateLocalAuthentication: Activate local authentication for sending transactions
